Name: Test-retest reliability of multi-metabolite edited MRS at 3T using PRESS and sLASER
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the associated paper when using this dataset: Archibald J,Bouchard AE, Noeske R, Shungu DC, Mikkelsen M. Test-retest reliability of multi-metabolite edited MRS at 3T using PRESS and sLASER. Magn Reson Med. 2025. doi:10.1002/mrm.70161
Funding: National Institute of Biomedical Imaging and Bioengineering (NIBIB) grant K99EB028828
EthicsApprovals: The Weill Cornell Medicine Institutional Review Board granted ethical approval for this study (protocol #0807009883)
